activities: Take part in the collaborative evolution of a B2B platform aimed at optimizing the exchange and valuation of collateral through pre-determined agreements linking banks with investment funds, all powered by cutting-edge Blockchain technology.
Build an authentication provider to integrate the entire enterprise suite of products, using clean architecture principles and SOLID principles.
Further improve your back-end project by introducing a streamlined architecture, resulting in a remarkable 25% reduction in the time it takes to introduce new features.

Participate in the development of a B2B platform focused on reducing the carbon footprint within the oil and gas sector. This involves creating a system that can effectively measure, quantify and produce detailed reports on emissions, which will ultimately guide the formulation of a strategic decarbonisation path.
Orchestrate the deployment of a CI/CD setup for both the back-end and front-end using AWS S3 and EC2, streamlining deployment processes.
Automate internal processes using a WordPress-based learning management system (LMS), update plugins to ensure smooth payment processing.
Train teachers and students to foster interest in robotics and logical thinking, and teach the use of specialized software in the creation of robotic routines.
Development of a platform for the management of new artists using a virtual manager, incorporating scalable and integrable technologies to allow the addition of new functionalities in the future.
